value: title: R Weekly 2017-51 Workflow, Epidemics, Mappers

#rstats PSA: CRAN submissions will be closed from Dec 22 to Jan 3rd for well-deserved vacation of volunteers and (would be) disruptive maintenance of check farm

— Gabe Becker (@groundwalkergmb) 10 de desembre de 2017

We are #coding our way towards an R package which downloads gridded datasets for a specified spatial and temporal extent, which datasets would you like to have easy access to? So far we have CHELSA, Bioclim, Hansen, Halpern, CRU, MODIS #EAB2017 #rstats @BritishEcolSoc pic.twitter.com/wAcFaxm53d

— Gergana Daskalova (@gndaskalova) 11 de desembre de 2017
